briefdescription.para: Initializes game services with custom settings created at runtime.

parameterdescription.para: Settings for the game services.

briefdescription.para: Loads the player details from game server.

parameterdescription.para: An array of player id's whose details has to be retrieved from game server.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Creates the score for specified leaderboard.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to uniquely identify the leaderboard.

briefdescription.para: Creates the score for specified leaderboard.

parameterdescription.para: The leaderboard object.

briefdescription.para: Returns the local player.
A boolean value indicating whether this local player is authenticated.

detaileddescription.para: true if is authenticated; otherwise, false.

briefdescription.para: Returns the cached leaderboards array.

simplesect.para: This property is invalid until a call to LoadLeaderboards(EventCallback<GameServicesLoadLeaderboardsResult>) is completed.

briefdescription.para: Returns the cached achievement description array.

simplesect.para: This property is invalid until a call to LoadAchievementDescriptions(EventCallback<GameServicesLoadAchievementDescriptionsResult>) is completed.

briefdescription.para: Returns the cached achievements array.

simplesect.para: This property is invalid until a call to LoadAchievements(EventCallback<GameServicesLoadAchievementsResult>) is completed.

briefdescription.para: Event called on local player auth change.
Creates a new instance of leaderboard object.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to uniquely identify the leaderboard.

briefdescription.para: Loads the leaderboards.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new instance of achievement object.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to uniquely identify the achievement.

briefdescription.para: Loads the achievement descriptions from game server.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Loads previously submitted achievement progress for the current local player.

parameterdescription.para: Callback method that will be invoked after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Reports the local user's achievement progress to game server, using platform specific id.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to uniquely identify the achievement.
The value indicates how far the player has progressed.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Reports the local user's achievement progress to game server.

parameterdescription.para: The achievement description object.
The value indicates how far the player has progressed.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Reports the local user's achievement progress to game server.

parameterdescription.para: The achievement object.
The value indicates how far the player has progressed.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Loads the list of friends for the authenticated local player.

parameterdescription.para: The callback that will be called after operation is completed. If successful, it will contain the list of friends.

briefdescription.para: Initiates a friend request to the specified player.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the player to send the request to.
The callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Initiates authentication process for the local player on the device.

parameterdescription.para: Indicates whether the authentication process should be interactive or not. If false, the authentication will be silent and will not prompt the user with a login dialog.

briefdescription.para: Signout the local player on the device.

memberdef.argsstring: (string leaderboardId, long value, CompletionCallback callback, string tag=null)
memberdef.name: ReportScore

briefdescription.para: Reports the score to game server.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to uniquely identify the leaderboard.
The value of the score.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.
The tag used to identify the score (optional). This needs to be of max length 8 characters in ascii characters.

briefdescription.para: Opens the standard view to display all the leaderboards.

parameterdescription.para: A time filter used to restrict which scores are displayed to the player.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

memberdef.argsstring: (string leaderboardId, LeaderboardTimeScope timescope=LeaderboardTimeScope.AllTime, EventCallback< GameServicesViewResult > callback=null)
memberdef.name: ShowLeaderboard

briefdescription.para: Opens the standard view to display leaderboard scores corresponding to given id.

parameterdescription.para: A string used to identify the leaderboard.
A time filter used to restrict which scores are displayed to the player.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

simplesect.para: Incase, if you want to list out all the leaderboards that are used in your game, then pass null for leaderboard identifier.

memberdef.argsstring: (ILeaderboard leaderboard, LeaderboardTimeScope timescope=LeaderboardTimeScope.AllTime, EventCallback< GameServicesViewResult > callback=null)
memberdef.name: ShowLeaderboard

briefdescription.para: Opens the standard view to display leaderboard scores corresponding to given leaderboard.

parameterdescription.para: The leaderboard object.
A time filter used to restrict which scores are displayed to the player.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

simplesect.para: Incase, if you want to list out all the leaderboards that are used in your game, then pass null for leaderboard identifier.

briefdescription.para: Opens the standard view to display achievement progress screen for the local player.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

briefdescription.para: Loads the server credentials.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

detaileddescription.para: The server credentials is a set of properties that can be used to connect to game service from your backend.

briefdescription.para: Loads the server credentials with additional scopes.

parameterdescription.para: Pass additional scopes required for the game to access from your backend.
Callback that will be called after operation is completed.

detaileddescription.para: The server credentials is a set of properties that can be used to connect to game service from your backend.

memberdef.argsstring: (EventCallback< GameServicesLoadServerCredentialsResult > callback, ServerCredentials serverCredentials, List< ServerCredentialAdditionalScope > additionalGrantedScopes, Error error)
memberdef.name: SendLoadServerCredentialsResult

briefdescription.para: Provides cross-platform interface to easily integrate popular social gaming functionalities such as achievements, leaderboards on your mobile games.

detaileddescription.para: Internally, game services feature uses native game servers for handling functionalities. So while running your game on iOS devices, Game Center servers will be used. Whereas on Android platform, Play Game Services server will be used.
Goto iTune's Connect to configure leaderboard, achievemnts for your iOS game. And for Android, add records at Google Developer Console.
